titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [Ende Juli / Anfang August 1945 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 180; deutsch: Briefe, S. 221; Cambridge Letters, S. 320; WiC, S. 380).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: This copy is lousy, but it's all I can get. Probably you have the 'Studien' already, then just throw these away. My favourites are NÂ° 4 & 5.
5 must be played very crisply & with a serious expression, not as though it were meant, in some way, to be witty.
P.S. The Marmalade is grand & not at all bitter.
